SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(FLAW_RPR_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FLAW_RPR_START_DT , TO_CHAR(FLAW_RPR_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FLAW_RPR_END_DT , FLAW_RPR_AMT , FLAW_RPR_CONTENTS , REG_USR , TO_CHAR(REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') REGIST_DT , UPD_USR , TO_CHAR(UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDT_DT , FLAW_RPR_ENTRPS_NM , FLAW_RPR_TY , TO_CHAR(FLAW_OCCRRNC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FLAW_OCCRRNC_DT , FLAW_RPR_COMPT_YN , FLAW_EXAM_SE , ENFORCE_YEAR , FLAW_RPR_NM , FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , FCLTS_JOB_SE , FLAW_RPR_SEQ , TO_CHAR(FLAW_EXAM_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FLAW_EXAM_DT , FLAW_ENNC , FLAW_EXAM_RESULT , RM , CTRT_NO FROM FLAW_RPR_DTLS_F WHERE 1 = 1
AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe#
AND FLAW_RPR_NM LIKE '%' || #sFlawRprNm# || '%'
AND FLAW_EXAM_SE = #sFlawExamSe#
AND ( FLAW_EXAM_DT >= #sFlawRprStartDtFr#
AND FLAW_EXAM_DT <= #sFlawRprStartDtTo#
)
ORDER BY FLAW_RPR_START_DT DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_CNT FROM FLAW_RPR_DTLS_F WHERE 1 = 1
AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe#
AND FLAW_RPR_NM LIKE '%' || #sFlawRprNm# || '%'
AND FLAW_EXAM_SE = #sFlawExamSe#
AND ( FLAW_EXAM_DT >= #sFlawRprStartDtFr#
AND FLAW_EXAM_DT <= #sFlawRprStartDtTo#
)

SELECT TO_CHAR(FLAW_RPR_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FLAW_RPR_START_DT , TO_CHAR(FLAW_RPR_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FLAW_RPR_END_DT , FLAW_RPR_AMT , FLAW_RPR_CONTENTS , REG_USR , TO_CHAR(REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') REGIST_DT , UPD_USR , TO_CHAR(UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDT_DT , FLAW_RPR_ENTRPS_NM , FLAW_RPR_TY , TO_CHAR(FLAW_OCCRRNC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FLAW_OCCRRNC_DT , FLAW_RPR_COMPT_YN , FLAW_EXAM_SE , ENFORCE_YEAR , FLAW_RPR_NM , FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , FCLTS_JOB_SE , FLAW_RPR_SEQ , TO_CHAR(FLAW_EXAM_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FLAW_EXAM_DT , FLAW_ENNC , FLAW_EXAM_RESULT , RM , CTRT_NO FROM FLAW_RPR_DTLS_F WHERE FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FLAW_RPR_SEQ = #flawRprSeq#

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , FCLTS_JOB_SE , FLAW_RPR_SEQ , FCLTS_MNG_NO , TO_CHAR(FLAW_EXAM_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FLAW_EXAM_DT , FLAW_ENNC , FLAW_EXAM_RESULT , RM , REG_USR , REGIST_DT , UPD_USR , UPDT_DT FROM FLAW_RPR_OBJ_FCLTS_F WHERE FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FLAW_RPR_SEQ = $flawRprSeq$
ORDER BY FLAW_RPR_SEQ ASC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_CNT FROM FLAW_RPR_OBJ_FCLTS_F WHERE FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FLAW_RPR_SEQ = $flawRprSeq$

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT FLAW_EXAM_USR , TO_CHAR(FLAW_EXAM_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FLAW_EXAM_DT , REG_USR , TO_CHAR(REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') REGIST_DT , UPD_USR , TO_CHAR(UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDT_DT , SEQ , FLAW_EXAM_COMPT_YN , FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , FCLTS_JOB_SE , FLAW_RPR_SEQ FROM FLAW_EXAM_USR_F WHERE FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FLAW_RPR_SEQ = $flawRprSeq$
ORDER BY FLAW_RPR_SEQ ASC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_CNT FROM FLAW_EXAM_USR_F WHERE FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FLAW_RPR_SEQ = $flawRprSeq$

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT FCLTS_JOB_SE , FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , FLAW_RPR_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SE , ( CASE WHEN ATCH_FILE_SE = 'D' THEN '문서' WHEN ATCH_FILE_SE = 'P' THEN '사진' WHEN ATCH_FILE_SE = 'Z' THEN '기타' END ) AS ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , TO_CHAR(ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT , REG_USR , REGIST_DT , UPD_USR , UPDT_DT FROM FLAW_RPR_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FLAW_RPR_SEQ = $flawRprSeq$
ORDER BY FLAW_RPR_SEQ ASC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_CNT FROM FLAW_RPR_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FLAW_RPR_SEQ = $flawRprSeq$
